title.narrative: Climate Envelope 2015: Support for CCAP (Centre for Clean Air Policy)

description.narrative:
CCAP is supporting a core of middle-income developing countries to obtain the capacity to develop Nationally Appropriate Mitigation Action (NAMA) projects that achieve both mitigation and sustainable development goals combining both policies and financial mechanisms to lead to transformational change to a low-carbon development pathway. CCAP will develop four NAMAs in Asia/Latin America, including NAMA funding application to the Green Climate Fund, the NAMA facility or other funding sources completed for at least two NAMAs by the end-of-project in 2016. Further, the CCAP will convene on regional outreach dialogue on NAMA showcasing and promotion.
The original scope of the project includes NAMA development on renewable energy in Pakistan, on fossil fuel subsidies in the transport sector in Ecuador, on industrial energy efficiency in Vietnam, and on solid waste in Colombia.
